glossentry.glossdef: Fair Usage Policy is a concept which defines the maximum usage cap for subscribers with unlimited data plan. This is invoked when the subscribed volume threshold of the user is over.
Flow based charging is a concept that applies different charging value for the traffic flows that belongs to various services.
File Transfer Protocol is a protocol that enables the transfer of text and binary files from one computer to another.
Final Unit Action is the action that is taken if the account balance of the user does not cover the service cost.
Final Unit Indication is an indication that shows the final service units for the service.
The Forwarded call is the incoming call of the subscriber that is automatically routed to another number.
